Bench Press

Sets: 3

Reps: 8

Difficulty: Intermediate

Muscle Group: Chest

Descripton

The bench press is a compound exercise that targets the chest muscles. Lie on a flat bench, lift the barbell, and lower it to your chest, then push it back up.

Incline Dumbbell Press

Sets: 3

Reps: 8

Difficulty: Intermediate

Muscle Group: Chest

Description

The incline dumbbell press targets the upper chest muscles. Lie on an inclined bench and press dumbbells upward, then lower them to chest level.

Dips

Sets: 3

Reps: 10

Difficulty: Intermediate

Muscle Group: Chest and Triceps

Description

Dips are a compound exercise that works the chest and triceps. Use parallel bars, lower your body, and push it back up.

Tricep Pushdowns

Sets: 3

Reps: 12

Difficulty: Intermediate

Muscle Group: Triceps

Description

Tricep pushdowns isolate the triceps. Use a cable machine, grip the bar with both hands, and push it downward, extending your arms.

Skull Crushers

Sets: 3

Reps: 10

Difficulty: Intermediate

Muscle Group: Triceps

Description

Skull crushers target the triceps. Lie on a bench, hold a barbell, and lower it toward your forehead, then extend your arms.
